``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - Anterior/proximal Radius @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Adjacent IO membrane @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Distal phalanx of thumb (palmar surface) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Anterior Interosseous N.]({{< var ref-anterior-interosseous-nerve.path >}}) ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **Wrist**: Flexion, Radial deviation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **CMC**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **1st MCP/IP**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
